loginSubtitle: Sign in to your account to continue
signupSubtitle: Join us and start your journey
checkYourInbox: We've sent a verification link to your email address. Please check your inbox to continue.
homeSubtitle: A multi-screen intelligent content scheduling and real-time information platform for robotics competitions, enhancing event experience and reducing organizer workload.
featureGroupDesc: Support grouping and unified scheduling of multiple displays, with content automatically switching according to event phases.
featureRealtimeDesc: Synchronize scores, rankings, and schedules in real time, so everyone stays up to date.
featureAIDesc: Intelligently analyze event flow and automatically recommend or generate suitable content.
projectGoalDesc: This system aims to provide efficient, intelligent information publishing and screen management tools for robotics event organizers and participants, supporting content customization, group display, offline fallback, AI assistance, and more.
dashboardSubtitle: Manage screens, content, and view real-time event data.
screenOverviewDesc: View and manage all connected display clients.
leaderboardDesc: Live scores and rankings from the event.
contentManagementDesc: Change and schedule what is shown on each screen.
aiRecommendationDesc: AI suggestions for missing or recommended content.
imageUploadDesc: Upload custom images to display on screens.
